Or anything which able any part to rotate on any chosen axis.

This should apply for "cargo bay" with "folded" modules or... thrust vectoring.

If nothing else, we'll probably get shuttle bays that open and close at some point. The person who made the B9 Aerospace mod works for SQUAD now, so you can expect some quality spaceplane parts at some point. Sadly, that won't be 'till they rework the aerodynamics, most likely.

In the mean-time, it'd be cool if they added some robotic arms or parts to make your own for doing science(collecting samples, poking holds in the dirt for chemical analysis and so on). Though, I think robotic stuff is on the what not to suggest list. So...I don't know. Ignore what I just said about rover arm bits >_>

Robotics and mechanical parts are on the what not to suggest list. They've been suggested and discussed many times and the developers are aware of the demand. Thank you for taking the time to make the suggestion though!

Topic closed.
